Message:
Life is a series of choices.
Even if you can put a problem
off momentarily, you can’t run
away from it forever.

So after much hesitation,
I made my decision.

With shaking hands,
I opened the letter.
My eyes were greeted
with a handwriting that
I was all too familiar with.

“I’m so happy to see you again.
Would you like to have
some tea together?
Of course, my sister
will be there, too.”

I couldn’t read the rest as my
eyes were brimming with tears.

but...also sorry that
she had to be the one
to break the ice.

At this rate, it’ll just be a
repeat of before.

I’m going to see them—
my best friends.
